name: Cryptocurrency Trading Bot Scam
description: Scammer poses as a senior analyst at a fake crypto trading firm, promising guaranteed 3x returns through an AI trading bot, then collects investment payments via UPI and bank transfer while directing victims to a phishing portal.

turns.scammer_message: Hello! I'm a senior analyst at CryptoWealth India. Our AI trading bot has 98% accuracy rate. Minimum investment Rs 10,000, guaranteed 3x returns in 30 days. Join our exclusive group of 500+ successful investors.
turns.notes: Initial bait with guaranteed high returns and fake credentials to attract victims.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for your interest! Let me show you our investor dashboard where you can track live profits. Visit http://cryptowealth-india.trade/join to create your free account. Our current investors are seeing 15-20% weekly returns. I can guide you through the entire process.
turns.notes: Scammer shares phishing link disguised as an investor dashboard.

turns.scammer_message: To start investing, the minimum amount is Rs 10,000. You can pay via UPI to cryptowealth.invest@paytm for instant activation. Your trading bot will start generating profits within 24 hours. For any questions, call our investment helpline at +91-9876501234.
turns.notes: Scammer reveals UPI ID and phone number for investment collection.

turns.scammer_message: I understand you want to verify first. Check the testimonials on our portal http://cryptowealth-india.trade/join. For larger investments above Rs 50,000, you can transfer directly to our corporate account 9988776655443311 (ICICI Bank) for better returns. Many investors start small and then increase.
turns.notes: Scammer shares bank account for larger amounts and repeats phishing link.

turns.scammer_message: SPECIAL OFFER: Invest Rs 25,000 today and get a bonus Rs 5,000 trading credit! This offer is only for the next 50 investors. Pay to cryptowealth.invest@paytm or account 9988776655443311. Register at http://cryptowealth-india.trade/join now!
turns.notes: Scammer uses limited-time bonus offer to push for immediate investment.

turns.scammer_message: Last chance for the bonus offer! Only 5 spots remaining. Our AI bot made 22% profit just today. Transfer minimum Rs 10,000 to cryptowealth.invest@paytm or bank account 9988776655443311. Call +91-9876501234 for VIP onboarding. This opportunity won't come again!
turns.notes: Final pressure with artificial scarcity, repeating all payment methods and contact info.
